bioconda.name: dinamo
bioconda.summary: An exact and efficient method for IUPAC motif discovery in DNA sequences

biocontainers.name: dinamo
biocontainers.summary: An exact and efficient method for IUPAC motif discovery in DNA sequences

biotools.summary: The DiNAMO software implements an exhaustive algorithm to detect over-represented IUPAC motifs in a set of DNA sequences.

bioschemas.name: DiNAMO
bioschemas.summary: The DiNAMO software implements an exhaustive algorithm to detect over-represented IUPAC motifs in a set of DNA sequences.
